general.export-graph-desc: Pick dates and export graph data as .PDF or .XLSX. Suitable to view in any table supporting platform.

general.image-not-available: Photos cannot be shared or exported

general.cancel-remove: No, I don't want to remove it
general.license-renew: I’d like to renew my license.
general.license-contact: Thank you for your request, our team will contact you soon.
general.license-negative-message: Without renewing your license, you won't be able to get updated data

errors.stage-date-must-be-greater-than-previous: Stage date must be greater than previous stage date.

errors.sowing-date-less-than-harvest-date: The sowing date cannot be greater than the harvest date.
errors.harvest-date-greater-than-sowing-date: Harvest date cannot be less than sowing date

auth.enter_valid_email_or_phone: Please enter a valid email address or phone number.

auth.welcome-content: Control your fields’ health by tracking your PestTrap and Filiz devices

auth.success_change_password: Your password has been successfuly changed

auth.terms-of-use: IoTrack Terms of Use and User Agreement

auth.password_max_length_err: Password must contain a maximum of 14 characters
auth.welcome-desc: A single app for all your devices

on-boarding.header-1: Track pests easily & spray on time
on-boarding.description-1: View PestTrap captures via your phone, get informed instantly about rises in the pest population.
on-boarding.header-2: Visualize the evolution of pest population in your field.
on-boarding.description-2: Analyze key metrics, view data over time, and summarize with graphs. Get insights for the whole season.
on-boarding.header-3: Monitor Soil and Weather Data Remotely and Take Action on Time
on-boarding.description-3: Filiz monitors the soil and weather conditions in your field and provides recommendations to optimize your irrigation, disease risk management, frost risk management and spraying decisions
on-boarding.header-4: View the Processed, and Interpreted Data
on-boarding.description-4: Check the graphs for all the measurements of the field, and examine all the records.

device-field-add.look-code: Look behind the device to find the QR code
device-field-add.qr-code: Place the QR code inside the rectangle above
device-field-add.add-field-desc: Draw or search your field in this step
device-field-add.info-step: Enter your field information in this step
device-field-add.save-success: Your device and field have successfully been added
device-field-add.demo-text: You can use the demo version of both devices to explore the app
device-field-add.pair-device: Have a device? Pair it now.
device-field-add.error-draw-header: The dots are not properly connected
device-field-add.confirm-text: To confirm your drawing, connect the dots
device-field-add.device-not-exist: The device is not registered to the system. Please try again with another device number.

add_field.farm_save_desc: Your field is average {{area}}. You can edit this information later.
add_field.succes_modal_desc_guest: We saved your field! You need to create an account to continue and view info specific to your field.
add_field.success_desc_title: We have successfully saved your field!
add_field.zoom_in_to_first_point: Zoom in on your field to add the first point.
add_field.add_other_clock_wise: Add the other points in clockwise or counterclockwise order. Do not intersect polygon boundaries.
add_field.touche_first_to_complete: Tap the first point to complete the drawing.
add_field.tap_drawing_to_update_or_reshape: You can activate editing by touching the drawing. Your field is now ready to save.
add_field.click_to_update_farm_borders: You can click to update borders.
add_field.empty-header: No field data could be found
add_field.not-equal-date: Sowing date must be different from harvest date.
add_field.change-dates: Harvest Date must be greater than Sowing Date.
add_field.find_location: Use the search bar above as you have not granted location permission
add_field.lines_crossed_alert_desc: The edges of the field you draw intersect.

weather.no-data-header: No forecast available. Better late than never!
weather.no-data-text: Please check again in an hour.
weather.filter-no-data-header: Hmm.. we can't find any results
weather.filter-no-data-text: Don't worry! Why not try searching for other keywords?

pesttrapp-home.sticky-almost-full-text: Trap is almost full, it may affect the pest count accuracy.
pesttrapp-home.preparing-image-text: This process may take a moment. Thank you for your understanding.

sticky-trap.add-desc: Add the date of your trap renewal

timeline.save-success: Your timeline data has successfully been added
timeline.quit-save-title: Are you sure you want to go back without saving?
timeline.quit-save-desc: Quitting will revert any unsaved changes
timeline.save-changes-desc: Phenological Stages feature allows you to add your own stages and easily view the progress of your crops
timeline.save-success-desc: You can later update the estimated dates in the Phenological Stages page.
timeline.date-error: You cannot enter a date equal to or less than the date of the previous stage. Please select a different date.
timeline.must-be-between-sowing-and-harvest: The date you choose must be between sowing and harvesting.

recommendation.empty-desc-for-disease: For the disease models to work, please add {{list}}
recommendation.harvest-done-desc: Your harvest date has passed, add new planting and harvest dates to continue working with the model.

disease-legend.unknown: Disease model available but not active.
disease-legend.no-risk: No fungus risk has been detected.
disease-legend.low-risk: Preliminary conditions achieved no spraying required.
disease-legend.spraying: You have sprayed, crop under protection.

spraying-hours.disease-model-not: DISEASE MODEL NOT AVAILABLE FOR THIS CROP
spraying-hours.add-timeline-warning: For the disease models to work, please add present phenological stage information on your home page.

map-filter.how_to_add_note_lbl: To add a note to your field, press and hold a point within the field borders for 2 seconds.

tools.yield_calc_coming_soon: You will soon be able to use Yield Calculation.
tools.notes_delete_note_title: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
tools.how_to_add_note_lbl: To add a note to your field, press and hold a point within the field borders for 2 seconds.
tools.scouting_notes_desc: With Scouting Notes, mark and take notes on potential problems that catch your eye on the Health Map. You can view the point you marked in the map applications and easily reach the problem area. You can share this note with others along with the location you marked. You can also easily add a note while in the field.
tools.irrigation_desc: After adding your info in our irrigation program, you can create an irrigation schedule and see how soil water content changes over time.
tools.spraying_hours_desc: Spraying Hours shows the available times to spray your field.

irrigation.change-date: The irrigation end date must be greater than the start date.
irrigation.soil-moisture-info: The sensor with the highest moisture variation is closest to the effective root zone. We recommend that you monitor this sensor closely.
irrigation.irrigation-status-info: If you recently irrigated, keep in mind that it may take a few days for the moisture values to rise.
